description:
I've had the fortune to work with tons of really hot guys over the years.
Sometimes, though, there's a guy who stands out in such a way that I just say to myself, "Please, heavens, I want to see this guy have sex!"
Jed is one of those guys.
I don't know if it's just his shyness, or the impression I get that's he's very awkward around girls... he's just got the most adorable personality. And, he's got one hell of a hot little body on him, and I was determined to see him in action!
It took a little bit of time to get him back. I don't know what it is with these small-town guys, but they always have something going on! School, family, girls, whatever!
Now, I knew that Jed was going to need some coaxing to get him out of his shell, at least initially. I also knew that humor is the best way to make someone feel comfortable.
So, it didn't hurt that Jarek can be a class clown when he wants to be!
They were actually a really cute couple together. Jarek was cracking jokes and Jed was laughing nervously.
A nice massage and some head from Jarek... and then Jed, my little muscle stud, was fucking the hell out of Jarek!
title: Jed & Jarek
